txt.en: You have destroyed many Orkish barricades at Zaghúth.
Discovered when the Haban'akkâ first attempted to travel to Azanulbizar, the Orcs of Moria have constructed a crude blockade on the slopes of Barazinbar, the Redhorn.
Although the Redhorn Pass remains blocked, your efforts to impair the defences of Zaghúth has loosened the Orcs' grip on Barazinbar.
Orkish barricades can be found at Zaghúth.\n\nYou should destroy Orkish barricades at Zaghúth.

While exploring the heights of the Redhorn Pass, you have come across the Orkish encampment of Zaghúth. Within Zaghúth, the Orcs have constructed a number of crude barricades to hinder the passage of the dwarves of the Haban'akkâ. In fact, it was this very blockade that forced the Haban'akkâ to approach Azanulbizar from the south instead of taking the Redhorn Pass.\n\nYou should destroy the Orkish barricades at Zaghúth and help to make clear the way for the Haban'akkâ.
Orkish barricades can be found at Zaghúth.\n\nYou should destroy Orkish barricades at Zaghúth.
